name: Creature Herder (prototype)
description:
***IMPORTANT, please do not click "Quit Game" this will cause the application to crash, just refresh if you do by mistake***

This is initially meant for the downloadable version.

Please let me know of any issues / bugs, or if you desire the downloadable version of the prototype.

Creature Herder is a small prototype designed to be a game that is simple to pick up and interact with as much as you please, whether that be a lot or very little.

The game centers around you dragging and dropping creatures back into their pen, or letting them run free, up to you!

Music "Talking Cute (Chiptune)" by Alex McCulloh: Here

KNOWN ISSUES:

- Creatures will occasionally become stuck, this is due to how they set paths for themselves. If it is bothering you or moving them does not help, please restart from the menu.

- Creatures can be dragged through walls if moved fast enough

- UI in the main scene of the game is not placed correctly in .HTML5 version
